patthana16.4:4.1: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:4.2: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:4.3: Kusalaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana16.4:5.1: Akusalaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:6.1: Abyākataṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:6.2: Abyākataṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:6.3: Abyākataṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.4:8.1: Kusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:8.2: Kusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:8.3: Kusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:9.1: Akusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:9.2: Akusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:9.3: Akusalaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:10.1: Abyākataṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:10.2: Abyākataṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.4:10.3: Abyākataṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.4:11.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
